item.name: X12 837 in request body to XML
EDIFACT ORDERS in request body to XML
Transform to EDI
X12 850 from JSON in request body
X12 850 from XML in request body

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ediroot>
    <interchange Standard="ANSI X.12" AuthorizationQual="00" Authorization="          " SecurityQual="00" Security="          " Date="230501" Time="0930" StandardsId="U" Version="00401" Control="000000001" AckRequest="0" TestIndicator="P" ElementDelimiter="*" SubElementDelimiter=">" SegmentTerminator="
">
        <sender>
            <address Id="SENDERID       " Qual="ZZ"/>
        </sender>
        <receiver>
            <address Id="RECEIVERID     " Qual="ZZ"/>
        </receiver>
        <group GroupType="PO" ApplSender="SENDERID" ApplReceiver="RECEIVERID" Date="20230501" Time="0930" Control="1" StandardCode="X" StandardVersion="004010">
            <transaction DocType="850" Name="Purchase Order" Control="0001">
                <segment Id="BEG">
                    <element Id="BEG01">00</element>
                    <element Id="BEG02">SA</element>
                    <element Id="BEG03">PO1234567</element>
                    <element Id="BEG05">20230501</element>
                    <element Id="BEG06">610385388</element>
                </segment>
                <segment Id="CUR">
                    <element Id="CUR01">BY</element>
                    <element Id="CUR02">USD</element>
                </segment>
                <segment Id="REF">
                    <element Id="REF01">DP</element>
                    <element Id="REF02">120</element>
                </segment>
                <segment Id="ITD">
                    <element Id="ITD01">14</element>
                    <element Id="ITD02">3</element>
                    <element Id="ITD03">2</element>
                    <element Id="ITD05">45</element>
                    <element Id="ITD07">46</element>
                </segment>
                <segment Id="DTM">
                    <element Id="DTM01">001</element>
                    <element Id="DTM02">20230510</element>
                </segment>
                <loop Id="N1-4000">
                    <segment Id="N1">
                        <element Id="N101">BY</element>
                        <element Id="N102">Buyer Company</element>
                        <element Id="N103">9</element>
                        <element Id="N104">123456789</element>
                    </segment>
                    <segment Id="N3">
                        <element Id="N301">100 Main Street</element>
                    </segment>
                    <segment Id="N4">
                        <element Id="N401">Anytown</element>
                        <element Id="N402">CA</element>
                        <element Id="N403">90210</element>
                    </segment>
                </loop>
                <loop Id="N1-4000">
                    <segment Id="N1">
                        <element Id="N101">ST</element>
                        <element Id="N102">Supplier Company</element>
                        <element Id="N103">9</element>
                        <element Id="N104">987654321</element>
                    </segment>
                    <segment Id="N3">
                        <element Id="N301">500 Industrial Park</element>
                    </segment>
                    <segment Id="N4">
                        <element Id="N401">Othertown</element>
                        <element Id="N402">TX</element>
                        <element Id="N403">75001</element>
                    </segment>
                </loop>
                <loop Id="PO1-8000">
                    <segment Id="PO1">
                        <element Id="PO101">1</element>
                        <element Id="PO102">100</element>
                        <element Id="PO103">EA</element>
                        <element Id="PO104">12.75</element>
                        <element Id="PO105">CB</element>
                        <element Id="PO106">12345-01</element>
                        <element Id="PO107">MG</element>
                        <element Id="PO108">AcmeWidget</element>
                    </segment>
                    <loop Id="PID-8150">
                        <segment Id="PID">
                            <element Id="PID01">F</element>
                            <element Id="PID05">Acme Widget Model A</element>
                        </segment>
                    </loop>
                    <loop Id="QTY-8250">
                        <segment Id="QTY">
                            <element Id="QTY01">21</element>
                            <element Id="QTY02">100</element>
                        </segment>
                    </loop>
                    <segment Id="DTM">
                        <element Id="DTM01">002</element>
                        <element Id="DTM02">20230515</element>
                    </segment>
                </loop>
                <loop Id="CTT-9000">
                    <segment Id="CTT">
                        <element Id="CTT01">1</element>
                    </segment>
                </loop>
            </transaction>
        </group>
    </interchange>
</ediroot>
